pages.text: $(l)Draugr$(), the fearsome undead warriors of ancient lore, are beings of relentless fury and unyielding strength. $(br2)Once proud warriors who fell in battle, they refused the call of the Valkyries and were condemned to roam Midgard as husks of their former selves. $(br2)$(l)Draugr$() haunt the taiga regions, their eyes burning with unholy fire. These undead beings retain their physical prowess and wield their weapons with deadly precision. $(br2)They haunt in small groups, attacking any who dare disturb their slumber. Adventurers in the taiga must be vigilant, for the $(l)Draugrâ€™s$() wrath is swift and merciless.
Some of them drop a small amount of $(l:resources/hacksilver)Hacksilver$() after death.
